flawed_nl_solution:
They started with 124 passengers. 58 got off and 24 got on so 124-58+24 = <<124-58+24=87>>87
87 people flew to NC where 47 passengers got off and 14 got on. This flight now had 87-47+14 = <<87-47+14=54>>54
There were also 10 crew members so 54+10 = 64 passengers landed in Virginia
#### 64

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 90, not 87. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
